attributes.action: INSTRUCT THE TRAIN COMPANIES TO HAVE ONLY ONE SINGLE CLASS OF TRAVEL
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It beggars belief that we have passengers crammed like cattle into dangerously overcrowded coaches with not a great deal of hope that the situation will change quickly. I have observed many many trains with 4 first class coaches and 5 standard class and all the first class were virtually empty.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
